course_recommendations_markdown:
### Recommended Courses and Learning Resources for Missing Skills:

#### Networking Fundamentals:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Networking Fundamentals on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/networking-fundamentals)
   - [Networking Fundamentals on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/networking-fundamentals/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - Medium
   - Networking Basics on Cisco's website

#### CI/CD:
1. **Courses:**
   - [CI/CD with Azure DevOps on Pluralsight](https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/azure-devops-ci-cd)
   - [CI/CD Pipelines with Jenkins on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/ci-cd-pipelines-jenkins/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - DevOps.com
   - Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment on Atlassian's website

#### Solution Design:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Architecting Microsoft Azure Solutions on edX](https://www.edx.org/course/architecting-microsoft-azure-solutions)
   - [Solution Design Fundamentals on LinkedIn Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/solution-design-fundamentals)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - Medium
   - Solution Design Principles on DZone

#### Infrastructure as Code (IaC):
1. **Courses:**
   - [Infrastructure as Code with Terraform on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/terraform-beginner-to-advanced/)
   - [Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Templates on Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - HashiCorp's Learn platform
   - Infrastructure as Code Basics on DevOps.com

#### Security Principles:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Azure Security Fundamentals on Pluralsight](https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/microsoft-azure-security-fundamentals)
   - [Cybersecurity Fundamentals on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/cyber-security-fundamentals)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project)
   - Security Principles on SANS Institute's website

#### Cloud Architecture:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Cloud Architecture with Microsoft Azure on edX](https://www.edx.org/course/cloud-architecture-with-microsoft-azure)
   - [AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/aws-certified-solutions-architect-associate/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - Microsoft Learn
   - Cloud Architecture Patterns on InfoQ
   - Cloud Architecture Best Practices on Cloud Academy

---

Feel free to explore these resources to enhance your skills in preparation for the Azure Solutions Architect role. Good luck! 🚀
